content: Wei Pan - Research Explorer The University of Manchester Wei Pan Dr Senior Lecturer in Machine Learning, Machine Learning and Robotics https://orcid.org/0000-0003-1121-9879 Emailwei.panmanchester.acukWebsitehttps://panweihit.github.io/ Accepting PhD Students Personal profile OverviewI am a Senior Lecturer (Associate Professor) in Machine Learning at the Department of Computer Science. Before joining Manchester, I was an Assistant Professor at the Department of Cognitive Robotics, TU Delft, Netherlands, and a Project Leader at DJI, China. I received a PhD degree from Imperial College London. I have a broad interest in robot control using Bayesian machine learning and the principles of dynamic control.
